pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fit a Cosinor Model Using a Generalized Mixed Modeling Framework // Allows users to fit a cosinor model using the 'glmmTMB' framework. This extends on existing cosinor modeling packages, including 'cosinor' and 'circacompare', by including a wide range of available link functions and the capability to fit mixed models. The cosinor model is described by Cornelissen (2014) doi:10.1186/1742-4682-11-16.
